Package org.cvs.data.repositories

Interface ApplicationUserRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ApplicationUser,​java.lang.Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<ApplicationUser,​java.lang.Long>
public interface ApplicationUserRepository
extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<ApplicationUser,​java.lang.Long>
Provides CRUD operations for ApplicationUser.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Yamiko J. Msosa

    • findByActiveFlags

      @Query("SELECT a FROM ApplicationUser a WHERE a.voided = :voidedFlag AND a.retired = :retiredFlag") java.util.List<ApplicationUser> findByActiveFlags​(@Param("voidedFlag") java.lang.Integer voidedFlag, @Param("retiredFlag") java.lang.Integer retiredFlag)
      Returns all ApplicationUsers that match a given set of retired and voided flags;
      Parameters:
      voidedFlag - void value to search for in the database
      retiredFlag - retired value to search for in the database
      Returns:
      a list of application user instances that match the search criteria

    • findByUsernameAndActiveFlags

      @Query("SELECT a from ApplicationUser a WHERE a.username = :username AND a.voided = :voidedFlag AND a.retired = :retiredFlag") java.util.List<ApplicationUser> findByUsernameAndActiveFlags​(@Param("username") java.lang.String username, @Param("voidedFlag") java.lang.Integer voidedFlag, @Param("retiredFlag") java.lang.Integer retiredFlag)
      Returns all ApplicationUsers that match a given a username and a set of retired and voided flags;
      Parameters:
      username - username for the application user to be used in the search criteria
      voidedFlag - void flag for the search criteria
      retiredFlag - retired flag for the search criteria
      Returns:
      a list of application user instances that match the search criteria
